security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; connect-src 'self' http://localhost:8000 https://parentshield.app https://*.parentshield.app; font-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'none'

bundle.shortDescription: Parental control software for blocking games and AI services
bundle.longDescription: ParentShield is a cross-platform parental control application that helps parents manage their children's access to games and AI services. Features include process blocking, DNS filtering, scheduling, and password protection.
